txt.en: Frostmantle is a great aurochs-bull that dwells in Thorin's Gate. The beast is surly and ill-tempered, charging any dwarf that dares cross its path.

<rgb=#00e4ff>This quest has been restored for Legendary Servers!</rgb>

'If you know the aurochs, you know what a menace they can be when something raises their ire. One of them is a brute of a particular and foul disposition, a beast Durin's Folk call Frostmantle.

'We can't get close to Frostmantle without him charging, and it's getting too dangerous to leave alone. I fear that someone's bound to get trampled, gored or worse! What say you go and kill the brute? Return with one of its horns and I'll see to it that you're rewarded.

'You'll find it wandering to the west of Frerin's Court here, by the old obelisk.'
Frostmantle roams the area by the old obelisk in hills west of Frerin's Court.\n\nSlay the aurochs called \qFrostmantle\q and bring back one of its horns to Bolli as proof of your victory.

<rgb=#00e4ff>This quest has been restored for Legendary Servers!</rgb>

'You ever hear of Frostmantle? It's an aurochs. A big one...and twice as mean.

'We can't get close to him without being attacked by the thing, and it is getting too dangerous to just leave him alone. I fear that someone's bound to get trampled, gored or worse! What say you go and kill the brute for us? Return with one of its horns, and I'll see to it that you're rewarded.

'You'll find it wandering to the west of here, by the old obelisk. The thing smells like an unwashed beard, so when in doubt, just follow your nose....'
'Thanks to you, [placeholder], Frostmantle won't be troubling anyone again!'

<rgb=#00e4ff>This quest has been restored for Legendary Servers!</rgb>

'You Elves know about aurochs, yes? One of them is a brute of a particular and foul disposition, a beast the Longbeards call Frostmantle.

'We can't get close to the creature without it attacking us...it's grown too dangerous to leave alone. I fear that someone's bound to get trampled, gored or worse! What say you hunt the beast down and kill it for us? Return with one of its horns, and I'll see to it that you're rewarded.

'You'll find it wandering to the west of here, by the obelisk. Be on your guard, friend. Frostmantle doesn't like us dwarves. I reckon he'll like your kind even less.'
'Ah, you have done it. That'll keep the area a bit safer, eh?\n\n'Good job!'

'Someone has to deal with Frostmantle, and that might as well be you. I can't be bothered risking my beard! Find him wandering around the old obelisk west of Frerin's Court here. Defeat Frostmantle and bring one of its horns to me.'
